newsitem.title: USA: New York timecharter fixtures - August 21.
newsitem.headline: New York timecharter fixtures - August 21.

text.p: Sun P. (built 1981) 65,738 dwt del Vlaardingen 25-26/8 redel Rotterdam via Aaheim $8,350 daily Skaugen.
TBN 49,000 dwt del Santos prompt redel USG $5,500 daily CNR.
Success Bulker (built 1981) 64,120 dwt del W.Australia Aug-Sept redel China $5,500 daily plus $57,500 bb NobleChart.
Konkar Star (built 1985) 89,582 dwt del pass Gibraltar prompt redel pass Gibraltar $8,000 daily Navios.
Waimea (built 1984) 61,751 dwt del Skaw prompt redel sail Egypt Med $6,800 daily NNC.
Angelic Spirit (built 1983) 65,767 dwr del USG 2-5/9 redel S.Korea $11,000 daily plus 150,000 bb PanOcean.
Meridian Sky (built 1989) 64,293 dwt del Antwerp 25-30/8 two to four months trading redel Atlantic $82,500y-1st 55, $87,500y-balance Navios.
Despina (built 1993) 65,644 dwt del pass Gibraltar 25-30/8 two to four months trading redel Atlantic $8,900 daily Guinomar.
Alfios (built 1981) 63,406 dwt del S.Korea 20/9-10/10 one year trading $8,250 daily option one year additional $8,400 daily Guinomar.
